Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 111th/Normal
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Wentworth, 115th, Halsted, & 111th, due to street blockage near 111th/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 111th, Wentworth, 115th, Halsted, & 111th, due to street blockage near 111th/Normal.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #73 Armitage Temporary Westbound Reroute near Cortland/Southport
ShortDescription: WB 73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, Clybourn, Sheffield, North Ave, Elston, & Cortland, due to street blockage near Cortland/Southport.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, Clybourn, Sheffield, North Ave, Elston, & Cortland, due to street blockage near Cortland/Southport.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison, #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Michigan/Congress Plaza
ShortDescription: Eastbound 7 Harrison, 26 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Harrison, Wabash and Balbo: due to, street blockage near Michigan/Congress Plaza.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #7 Harrison, #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Harrison, Wabash and Balbo: due to, street blockage near Michigan/Congress Plaza.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #143 Stockton/Michigan Express, #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Michigan/Congress Plaza
ShortDescription: EB 143 Stockton/Michigan , #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore buses are temp rerouted via Michigan, Harrison, Wabash and Balbo: near Michigan/Congress Plaza.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #143 Stockton/Michigan Express, #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express  buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Harrison, Wabash and Balbo including the normal route streets at the beginning and end, due to street blockage near Michigan/Congress Plaza.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
